name: Name
aboutMeProfile: Started my career as a web engineer, consistently handling everything from design to implementation and operation in multiple BtoB/BtoC web app developments. I am a full-stack engineer capable of working across a wide range of areas, including frontend development with React/Nuxt/TypeScript, backend/API development with Express/Python, and cloud infrastructure mainly on Azure. In addition to development, I have continuously contributed to technology selection, architecture design, CI/CD improvements, and productivity/quality enhancements. I also have experience leading small teams, promoting Scrum events, and conducting code reviews. At Microsoft Japan, I solved many technical issues as a PaaS support engineer for Azure App Service, acquiring communication skills for a wide range of users, including non-engineers. This experience is now utilized in requirements definition, specification adjustments, and customer communication. Currently, I am leading workflow improvements using AI and the introduction of AI features into products, focusing on maximizing team productivity and developing features directly linked to business value.
aboutMeRecommendation: Mr. Anno has experience in web application development, cloud solution development, operation, and support, as well as soft skills (listening, understanding customer needs and expectations, and providing easy-to-understand explanations from the customer's perspective) in both his previous and current positions. As a team player, he actively engages with team members, quickly acquires technical, business, and soft skills, and contributes to the team. Even in tense situations such as urgent responses to mission-critical systems, he collaborates with team members and responds with a sense of speed that meets customer expectations. He is an engineer with both soft and technical skills and knowledge, capable of contributing in any role, with the ability to create easy-to-understand materials (blogs, customer documentation, etc.) and strong verbal communication skills. His consideration for others and attention to detail make him a strong team player, and his commitment to self-improvement and strong sense of responsibility allow him to be entrusted with work with confidence.
subject: Subject
supportMessage:
All works here are created individually.
Your support will encourage my next creation.
work.general.title: Web Service for General Households
work.general.description: A service to manage the power generation and usage of solar panels for detached houses. Responsible for frontend (React), backend (Express), and cloud (Azure) construction, development, and maintenance.
work.general.overview: Developed a system to manage the power generation and usage of solar panels installed in detached houses. Developed in an agile team of less than 10 people.
work.general.responsibility.1: Built frontend (React), backend (Express), and cloud environment (Azure)
work.general.responsibility.4: Training young members, code review, technical consultation
work.general.responsibility.5: Progress management in small task units
work.general.skills.1: Full-stack development skills using React / Express
work.general.skills.2: Cloud environment construction skills using Azure App Service, Azure Functions, etc.
work.general.skills.3: Team development experience in agile development (Scrum)
work.general.skills.4: API design and asynchronous communication implementation know-how
work.general.skills.5: Design of data linkage between frontend and backend with performance in mind
work.general.skills.6: Customer hearing and requirements organization skills
work.general.comment.1: Designed with consideration for asynchronous communication and data update load to visualize solar power generation in real time.
work.general.comment.2: Since it was a full-stack configuration combining React, Express, and Azure, development was carried out with an awareness of consistency between each layer.
work.general.comment.3: Since the project was conducted in agile development (Scrum), I was able to quickly improve by repeating requirements adjustment → implementation → testing → review in short sprints.
work.general.comment.4: I was also in charge of coordination and hearings with customers, and acquired the ability to explain technical backgrounds in an easy-to-understand manner even for non-engineers.
work.general.comment.5: Actively provided technical support and code reviews to young members, contributing to improving the productivity and quality of the entire team.
work.doctor.title: Patient Diagnosis Support Service for Doctors
work.doctor.description: A service for diabetic patients and pregnant women who need to regularly and accurately monitor their biometric information, to upload biometric data to the cloud using wearable devices and share it with doctors. Responsible for web page maintenance with .netCore and cloud (Azure).
work.doctor.overview: Developed a system for diabetic patients and pregnant women who need to regularly and accurately monitor their biometric information, to upload biometric data to the cloud using wearable devices and share it with doctors.
work.doctor.responsibility.1: Agile development with less than 10 people
work.doctor.responsibility.2: Responsible for designing the connection method with device partners
work.doctor.responsibility.3: Responsible for documenting the existing configuration
work.doctor.responsibility.4: Responsible for web page maintenance with .NetCore and cloud (Azure)
work.doctor.skills.1: Understanding of data linkage requirements in medical systems (security, consistency, fault tolerance)
work.doctor.skills.2: Communication protocol and API specification adjustment skills with devices
work.doctor.skills.3: Understanding and adjustment skills of Azure (Functions, App Service, storage, etc.) configuration
work.doctor.skills.5: Issue management and stakeholder coordination ability in an agile environment
work.doctor.comment.1: Since the participation period for this project was short, the main tasks were especially configuration adjustments around the cloud and specification coordination with device providers. In order to proceed smoothly even in a short period, I carefully examined existing documents and logs, and was conscious of the speed of situation grasp.
work.doctor.comment.2: Due to the nature of medical data linkage, emphasis was placed on accuracy and security, and careful design was carried out to prevent inconsistencies and omissions in the examination of data linkage methods.
work.doctor.comment.3: In documenting the existing configuration, I organized the parts that had become personalized, and by summarizing them into configuration diagrams and flows that new members could easily understand, I contributed to improving the overall development efficiency of the project.
work.c02.title: CO2-Free Power Visualization & DR Support Service for Corporations
work.c02.description: A service to visualize what percentage of the power used at corporate sites is CO2-free. Also developed a service to support demand response (DR) operations that request to refrain from using electricity during power shortages. Developed in an agile team of less than 20 people.
work.c02.overview: A service to visualize what percentage of the power used at corporate sites is CO2-free. Also developed a service to support demand response (DR) operations that request to refrain from using electricity during power shortages. Developed in an agile team of less than 20 people.
work.c02.responsibility.1: Development and maintenance of frontend (React), backend (Express), and cloud environment (Azure)
work.c02.responsibility.2: Responsible for documenting the existing configuration
work.c02.responsibility.4: Promotion of agile (Scrum) development (holding Scrum events)
work.c02.responsibility.5: Led the construction and optimization of CI/CD environments (Azure DevOps / GitHub Actions)
work.c02.responsibility.6: Organized and documented infrastructure configuration and overall system structure, and explained to the team
work.c02.skills.1: Web application design and implementation skills using React / Express
work.c02.skills.2: Understanding and operation skills of cloud configuration centered on Azure (App Service, Functions, Storage, etc.)
work.c02.skills.3: Construction and efficiency improvement of CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions / Azure DevOps)
work.c02.skills.4: Agile development promotion including Scrum Master role
work.c02.skills.5: Overall design perspective considering non-functional requirements (performance, operation, availability)
work.c02.skills.6: Communication skills for customer hearings and specification adjustments
work.c02.comment.1: Since the service handles large and highly variable power data, the backend and cloud configuration were designed and tuned with performance in mind.
work.c02.comment.2: In organizing the CI/CD environment, I reviewed the build time and deployment procedures, which were bottlenecks for the development team, and contributed to improving development speed by realizing automation and speeding up.
work.c02.comment.3: In customer hearings, I accurately understood the requirements of the power industry, which has many technical terms, and organized feasibility from a technical perspective to make proposals, supporting the early establishment of development policies.
work.c02.comment.4: In promoting Scrum events, I encouraged communication improvement and habit formation of issue sharing within the team, contributing to the maturity of agile development.
work.blockchain.title: Consortium Blockchain Service PoC
work.blockchain.description: Built a consortium-type service using HyperLedger Fabric. Built a secure site entry management system.
work.freeaddress.title: Free Address Seat Management Service (In-house Service)
work.freeaddress.description: A free address seat management service using face authentication for login. Responsible for everything from planning, technology selection, development, to operation.
work.azure.title: Azure PaaS Support Engineer
work.azure.description: Worked as a support engineer for Azure App Service, handling technical inquiries, troubleshooting, and knowledge sharing.
work.azure.responsibility.1: As a support engineer for App Service, provided support for customer questions such as 'this error occurred' or 'is it possible to realize this operation?'
work.azure.responsibility.2: For detailed questions about App Service specifications or issues with suspected bugs, discussed with overseas engineers and provided information to customers who inquired
work.azure.responsibility.3: Knowledge sharing inside and outside the company (tech blogs, study sessions)
work.azure.skills.1: Detailed understanding of PaaS products centered on Azure App Service
work.azure.skills.2: Troubleshooting ability using log analysis and Kudu/diagnostic tools
work.azure.skills.3: Technical discussion and escalation with product teams (English-speaking countries)
work.azure.skills.4: Explanation skills tailored to the customer's technical level (abstraction, step-by-step explanation)
work.azure.skills.5: Organizing and documenting recurrence prevention measures and best practices
work.azure.skills.6: Accurate and prompt situation assessment and issue isolation skills
work.azure.comment.1: By carefully hearing the background and operational status of inquiries, I not only provided answers but also identified the root cause and suggested recurrence prevention measures, contributing to improved customer satisfaction.
work.azure.comment.2: In coordination with overseas engineers, I not only discussed technical matters in English but also played a role in explaining things in an easy-to-understand manner to customers, helping to bridge communication gaps.
work.azure.comment.3: By deeply understanding the specifications and limitations of App Service, I was increasingly entrusted with technically difficult inquiries, and actively worked on knowledge sharing within the team.
work.knowledge.title: Knowledge Platform
work.knowledge.description: A platform where companies and individuals with issues can use various services centered on 'VisasQ interview,' a spot consulting service that allows business consultations with experts by the hour.
work.knowledge.overview: A platform where companies and individuals with issues can use various services centered on 'VisasQ interview,' a spot consulting service that allows business consultations with experts by the hour.
work.knowledge.responsibility.1: Frontend (Nuxt) and backend (Python) development and maintenance
work.knowledge.responsibility.2: Improvement of CICD environment for better development experience
work.knowledge.responsibility.5: Project lead for small projects (about half a year)
work.knowledge.responsibility.6: Integration of AI into the system
work.knowledge.skills.1: Frontend development skills using Nuxt / TypeScript
work.knowledge.skills.2: API design and implementation skills using Python (FastAPI / Flask, etc.)
work.knowledge.skills.3: Development efficiency improvement by building and improving CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions / CircleCI)
work.knowledge.skills.4: Process design for integrating AI coding tools into business flows
work.knowledge.skills.5: Skills for improving functions and organizing requirements through user hearings
work.knowledge.skills.6: Project lead for small teams (progress management, specification adjustment, review)
work.knowledge.skills.7: PoC design of AI functions, API integration, technical verification for service introduction
work.knowledge.comment.1: By organizing issues in the existing system and leading automation of CI/CD and improvement of the review system, contributed to improving development speed and quality.
work.knowledge.comment.2: In utilizing AI coding tools, adjusted settings and organized best practices according to the development flow, contributing to improving the productivity of the entire team.
work.knowledge.comment.3: In user hearings, grasped the essence of business background and issues, and made optimal proposals from a technical perspective, creating outputs that directly led to product improvement.
work.knowledge.comment.4: In integrating AI functions, was consistently in charge from PoC stage to verification and implementation, contributing to building the foundation for functions that provide new value. Also handled coordination with infrastructure and cross-development teams, contributing to building the foundation for integrating AI into the system as a development organization.
work.creative.title: CreateiveCoding
work.creative.description: Creating visually appealing interactions in a sandbox environment using Spline, which can render 3D models on web pages, and Lottie, which enables simple animations.
work.photo.title: Photo Portfolio
work.photo.description: Publishing a portfolio of photos taken as a hobby. Tried out animations and aimed for a visually appealing site.
